extendedInfo.description: Free first person perspective indie horror game. If you like Slender, you'll like it too.!!! To Dr Web (and other antivirus apps) users - this game doesn't contain any viruses! It's perfectly safe; some antivirus software wrongly recognizes advertisement as threat.Search an old, abandoned house and collect any valuables but be careful - there are rumors of a ghost haunting the building. Experience fear and deep horrifying atmosphere.They told you it would be easy. Just break-in, grab all the stuff and get back to the door. They didn't know that house was not empty. And those creepy eyes on the wall.. You know she's coming for you, don't you?App with ads.

reviews.title: Pretty good.
reviews.comment: This game provides a good scary experience for anyone looking for one. And of course, has room for improvement. Just one question: when do we get the PC update?
reviews.author: Aaron madridLOL

reviews.comment: This is a very well put together game! Runs fine, never crashes, and the graphics aren\'t that bad. My only problem is the ads when you die or try to go to another menu. This isn\'t a big deal but I just thought I would point out out.\t9/10
reviews.author: garett schwatka

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Finally a good computer game for android! Needs bigger controls, and random jump scares (\342\230\206\342\226\275\342\230\206)
reviews.author: Morgan Dickerson

reviews.title: This is great but
reviews.comment: The ambience is perfect, probably the best I\'ve seen on android. It just needs some jumpscares for e.g. A 3 in 10 chance of a door swinging open when your near it. Also a decrease in the light around you and a torch would be amazing as it would add massively to the jumpy nature of the game
reviews.author: whambam jamsandwich

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I honestly LOVE this game and at times it can be scarier than Slender! I recommend this game to any Indie Horror Game Lover. Its also available for PC! It\'s great!
reviews.author: Elizabeth Dixon

reviews.title: 5 star !
reviews.comment: This is the scariest game i ever played ! I screamed when i saw the lady ! Hahaha so creepy. Nice game :)
reviews.author: Alejandro Marquez

reviews.comment: Takes a while to get the hang of the controls,but after you do its a great game. Like the size and scope of the house. Graphics are great. Cant say enough about this game. Excellent.
reviews.author: Michael Perosi

reviews.title: no more ADS
reviews.comment: Great game but its really difficult to play it wheni have 5 million ads popping up stopping me from playing the game   Please sort out
reviews.author: Km Fairfax

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: I love it I just wish there was moro levels for I can pass and thanks for this awesome game:-);-)\342\231\245\342\231\241\342\231\245\342\231\241
reviews.author: Ernestina Villegas

reviews.title: great horror for phone :3
reviews.comment: if you could add internet co op like with 2 people playing on the same stage it would be a five star to me. other than that its a great game! Im very impressed and satisfied with this game but i hope there could be a co op mode :3 keep it up
reviews.author: lexio silver

reviews.title: I don\'t know...
reviews.comment: The game is supposed to be great but the adds literally won\'t let me off the home screne because every time I press play it brings up the add and as soon as it closes it always takes me to the applications opening loading screne please fix because I can\'t play.. I am curently working with a kyrocera rise

reviews.author: Arshad Ahmed

reviews.title: This sucks due to tons of push ads!
reviews.comment: I\'d like to give this excellent game 5 stars. However, the push ads you constantly send to my phone make it worthy of a single star. I\'m uninstalling this game and will refuse to get any other offering by this very greedy developer.
reviews.author: Benj Pagt

reviews.title: Scary crap XD
reviews.comment: I did not see the lady hood kaz I had my head down in the game and I just saw run!!! And I left the game XD
reviews.author: Harley Lynch

reviews.title: Excelent !
reviews.comment: LOVE This game.... I\'m very intersting with this game...  It work ! Make scary....
reviews.author: Petronius Kevin

reviews.title: Play this game now.
reviews.comment: If you love suspense, crazy good map, and a creepy lady\'s head following you around, play this game. It\'s like an indoor Slenderman.
reviews.author: Jonathan Wilson

reviews.title: Bone chilling
reviews.comment: I believe this is a good one, very scary and some intense run moments.  Only issue is the spam of ads and the adding of random apps without approval, please let me have a choice of what I want on my phone.
reviews.author: Marvin Raines

reviews.title: Awesomeness!
reviews.comment: I liked it on the pc creepy but I was surprised it was for my android too! And it ran pretty smoothly I like :D
reviews.author: Adrian Santacruz

reviews.title: Unwanted extras
reviews.comment: What\'s this second icon you\'ve forced onto my home screen? Good game but beyond poor form giving push notifications for adds with no option to turn off.  I know you need to get an investment somehow but that\'s just plain invasion.
reviews.author: Michael Cross

reviews.title: Love the game but......
reviews.comment: I love this game. Its such a scary atmosphere. I was so excited when it became an app but it has a virus in it.  My avg app for my phone called it an in trusted virus. It also pops up weird ads when I\'m not playing the game. I don\'t know if I\'m going to keep it or delete it yet cause I love the game so much.
reviews.author: Alissa Mitchell
